acf.title: Chief Strategic Development Officer
acf.bio_copy:
Mark Meskin is Chief Strategic Development Officer and a member of the firm's Senior Management team. He is responsible for overseeing the firm’s global business development efforts, strategic partnerships and initiatives, and external portfolio managers.

Prior to joining Millennium in 2002, Mark spent nine years as Managing Director and Principal for Helfant Group, a NYSE member firm, responsible for the upstairs trading, operations and technology areas.

Mark received an MBA in Finance from New York University. He received a Master’s in Information Systems from the University of Cape Town, South Africa.
acf.subtitle: Trading Management
